modName: Age of Agression Menu Song  (BY Malukah)
summary:
Tired of the same menu song for skyrim???
Well in that case this mod is for you

This mod replaces the original menu song with Age of Aggression Skyrim Cover made by Malukah
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]HI!
[/size]
[size=3]Thanks for downloading my first mod =)

One cool thing of this mod is that the song its full and well edited (so it doesnt have the "thanks for watching" comment)
[/size]
[size=5][color=#ff7700]SOME INFO:[/color]
[/size][color=#efefef]

[size=4]-The song was originally made by [url=http://www.malukah.com/]Malukah[/url].

-I used xWMAEncode.exe controled by the windows Command Prompt for the convertion.

-I just added a few seconds of fade-in and fade-out to accord the skyrim menu.

-I also removed the "thanks for watching" comment at the end.

-The song and all skyrim can be better heard with headphones.[/size]


[/color]

[size=5]
[/size][color=#6aa84f][size=5]INSTALLATION:[/size]
[/color]
[size=3]Just move the "music" folder inside the "Data" folder to your skyrim directory[/size]

[size=3]***If you already have the "music" folder inside your "Data" folder DO NOT OVERWRITE IT***[/size]

[size=3]-copy the "special" folder inside the "music" folder[/size]

[size=3]***If you already have the "special" folder just copy the "mus-maintheme.xwm" inside it***[/size]

[size=6][color=#b6b6b6]
THE SONG:[/color]
[youtube]KNDT7EInclo[/youtube][/size]
